title: Game Scoop Episode 597
description: This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Tina Amini, Sam Claiborn, and Justin Davis -- discuss the disappointment around Spider-Man Ultimate Edition on PS5, they play "Real Mature, Video Games," discuss Star Wars Squadrons, flip through the October 1994 issue of Electronic Games, and more. The music in this episode is from Alien 3 on NES and the closing track is Daemon's new cover of "Pet Sematary" by the Ramones. Scoop!
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
